edu.usm.cos420.example1.controller

Class CItemController

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.usm.cos420.example1.controller.CItemController

  • public class CItemController
extends java.lang.Object
    A Controller class to execute user's menu choice. List of possible choices can be found at edu.usm.cos420.example1.view.TextUI

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CItemController(CItemView view, ExampleService service)
      Constructor : pass in a service class which can provide access to cItem operations.

    • Method Summary

      Allow the user to access the citem collection
